TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Docking Bay[COLOR_REVERT] is required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition.
TEXT.Chinese: 需要使用[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS对接架[COLOR_REVERT]才能达到[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]太空竞赛[COLOR_REVERT]的胜利条件。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Apollo Program[COLOR_REVERT] is required to create the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Cockpit[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Life Support[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Stasis Chamber[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Docking Bay[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Engines[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Casings[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Thrusters[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 用于建造太空飞船组件。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Removes one non-state religion from this city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Causes temporary disorder and unhappiness
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]从这座城市中移除非官方宗教[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]这将导致叛乱和不满

TEXT.English: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Engines[COLOR_REVERT] are required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition. They also increase the speed of the spaceship.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS引擎[COLOR_REVERT]需要达到[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]太空竞赛[COLOR_REVERT]的胜利条件。它们还提高了宇宙飞船的速度。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Stasis Chamber[COLOR_REVERT] is required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition.
TEXT.Chinese: 需要使用[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Station Chamber[COLOR_REVERT]来实现[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]太空竞赛[COLOR_REVERT]的胜利条件。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SDI[COLOR_REVERT] gives a fifty percent chance of intercepting nukes.

[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Casings[COLOR_REVERT] are required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition. Increases the chance of a successful mission for the spaceship.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS外壳[COLOR_REVERT]需要达到[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]太空竞赛[COLOR_REVERT]的胜利条件。增加飞船成功执行任务的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Cockpit[COLOR_REVERT] is required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition.
TEXT.Chinese: 需要使用[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS驾驶舱[COLOR_REVERT]来实现[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]太空竞赛[COLOR_REVERT]的胜利条件。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Internet[COLOR_REVERT] grants all technologies that are already discovered by 2 known civilizations.
TEXT.Chinese: 建造者自动获得所有已被两个文明发现的科技。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+3[ICON_CULTURE] for Satellites[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Half the spaceship production modifier also increases culture output
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+3[ICON_CULTURE] 卫星[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]一半的宇宙飞船生产修正也会增加文化输出

TEXT.English: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Thrusters[COLOR_REVERT] are required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition. They also increase the speed of the spaceship.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS推进器需要[COLOR_REVERT]来实现[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]太空竞赛[COLOR_REVERT]的胜利条件。它们还提高了宇宙飞船的速度。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Life Support[COLOR_REVERT] is required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition.
TEXT.Chinese: 需要[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS生命支持[COLOR_REVERT]来实现[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]太空竞赛[COLOR_REVERT]的胜利条件。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Manhattan Project[COLOR_REVERT] is required to create [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SDI[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows you to construct [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tactical Nukes[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 所有玩家可建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战略导弹[COLOR_REVERT]与[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防空洞[COLOR_REVERT]。
